Name: maximize_average_story_points
Description: Increase average delivered story points across sprints

Name: minimize_sprint_backlog_effort
Description: Reduce total implementation effort in each sprint backlog

Name: minimize_blocker_severity
Description: Lower overall severity of blockers affecting tasks

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize rate of achieving sprint goals

Name: minimize_project_budget_usage
Description: Minimize budget consumption for the project

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Reduce total task effort selected into the sprint

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Improve team satisfaction measured in retrospectives

Name: minimize_daily_scrum_duration
Description: Keep daily stand-ups short and focused

Name: maximize_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Prioritize items with higher stakeholder relevance

Name: maximize_release_readiness
Description: Maximize share of features in “ready” release status

Name: minimize_planning_time
Description: Reduce time spent in sprint planning meetings
